body_html: Also tested that latest 0.8 pip release with cudnn v4 and it works fine with the card as well. I may suggest adding to the cuda installation instructions that cudnn v4 should be installed if not installing from source.
body_text: Also tested that latest 0.8 pip release with cudnn v4 and it works fine with the card as well.  I may suggest adding to the cuda installation instructions that cudnn v4 should be installed if not installing from source.
body: Also tested that latest 0.8 pip release with cudnn v4 and it works fine with the card as well.  I may suggest adding to the cuda installation instructions that cudnn v4 should be installed if not installing from source.
